title: List of all Android license  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android license  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: LicensesDialog
repoList.description: LicensesDialog is an open source library to display licenses of third-party libraries in an Android app.

repoList.name: openalpr-android
repoList.description: Android Automatic License Plate Recognition library (http://www.openalpr.com) ported for android.

repoList.name: LicenseView
repoList.description: A simple library to show licenses in your android application.

repoList.name: SlidingMenu
repoList.description: An Android library that allows you to easily create applications with slide-in menus. You may use it in your Android apps provided that you cite this project and include the license in your app. Thanks!

repoList.name: EasyLicensesDialog
repoList.description: [DEPRECATED] An android library to display the licenses of your application libraries in a easy way.

repoList.name: Licenser
repoList.description: An android library to display the licenses of your application libraries in a easy way.

repoList.name: PiracyChecker
repoList.description: An Android library that prevents your app from being pirated / cracked using Google Play Licensing (LVL), APK signature protection and more. API 14+ required.

repoList.name: android-studio-project-with-lvl-sample
repoList.description: Android Studio project sample with LVL (License Verification Library / play_licensing)

repoList.name: WinGoku-Android-FlatUI
repoList.description: An Android library that allows you to easily create professional looking & visual appealing "Flat UI" applications. You may use it in your Android apps provided that you cite this project and include the license in your app.

repoList.name: Licenses-Library
repoList.description: Simple library to show the list of licenses your app uses
